content.description: Sit start with left hand on sidepull around arete, right hand on jug ledge, left foot in small crack near ground. Stand up, flagging right foot, and match hands on jug. Smear a super high left foot (chest height) and rock onto foot, reaching left to crimp. Stand up, still flagging right, until you can match right foot onto jug. Reach right to sidepull, work feet up then reach for top.
content.location: Climbs flattened corner facing southwest towards Pretty Face.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on huge sidepull. Stand up, reach left to small edge, then right to three-finger hold with thumb catch. Bounce feet left, then step left foot to small edge. Reach left hand to tiny crimp near top. Mantle press with right hand and bump right foot into small "pocket" within the crack. Once in, lean all your weight against the slab and bounce left hand to top.
content.location: On clean slab directly left of Hood Ornament, on side facing west (JBL).

content.description: A (you guessed it) Vanagon-sized boulder with perfect landings and varying features.
